sentences.en: But the move to abolish shared berths for rail passengers travelling alone from London to Cornwall shows that, like Greta Garbo, we all now want to be alone.
sentences.cn: 但废除从伦敦到康沃尔的单身旅行者共用铺位的运动却表明，如同葛丽泰·嘉宝那样，现在的我们希望独处。

sentences.en: Cornwall , over the centuries, had suffered a gradual economic decline.
sentences.cn: 康沃尔许多世纪以来在经济上已逐渐衰落.

sentences.en: Drinking water poisoned people in Cornwall, south - west England, in 1988.
sentences.cn: 1988年,饮用水导致英格兰西南部康沃尔郡的人中毒.

sentences.en: During her 1887 visit to St Ives, Cornwall, Schjerfbeck painted " The Convalescent ".
sentences.cn: 在谢夫贝克1887年旅行康沃尔的过程中, 她创作出了油画 “ 康复的病人 ”.

sentences.en: He lives in retirement in Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 他在康沃尔郡过退休生活.

sentences.en: He sold out his shop and moved to Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 他把商店顶出去,搬到康沃尔去了.

sentences.en: Her crew consisted of children from Devon and Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 她的团队由来自德文郡和康沃尔郡的孩子们组成。

sentences.en: I think you've been too long in Cornwall. You've forgotten the ways of the city.
sentences.cn: 我认为你们在康沃尔呆的太久了，已经忘记了城市的生活方式。

sentences.en: If that holiday in Cornwall doesn't work wonders I shall be very much surprised.
sentences.cn: 我深信在康沃尔度假会创造奇迹的.

sentences.en: If you are keen to climb on sea cliffs, go to Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 如果你渴望爬到海边的悬崖上, 你可以去康沃尔.

sentences.en: Prince Charles leads an expensive life and the Duchy of Cornwall is there to fund it.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯王子过着一种奢侈的生活，这些都由康沃尔公国进行资助。

sentences.en: Robert Milmore of Cornwall , New York, said the attacks strengthened his resolve.
sentences.cn: 来自纽约Cornwall的 RobertMilmore 说,袭击增强了他的决心.

sentences.en: The National Trust has placed an interdict on jet-skis in Dorset, Devon and Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 国民托管组织已颁布禁令，禁止在多塞特、德文与康沃尔地区使用水上摩托艇。

sentences.en: The next stop on this cruise is likely to be in Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 此次航游的下一站很可能是在康沃尔。

sentences.en: The population of Scotland was eight as large as that of Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰的人口是康沃尔人口的八倍.

sentences.en: The village of Zennor lies upon the windward coast of Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 真纳是康沃尔郡迎风的海岸边上的小渔村.

sentences.en: They sold up and went to live in Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 他们变卖了一切,然后到康沃尔去住.

trans.tran_cn: 康沃尔（英格兰郡名，加拿大城市名）
